title: Kwik Sew K2704 Sleeper and Jumpsuit Sewing Pattern, Size XS-S-M-L-XL
features: Includes pattern pieces and sewing instructions
description: These sleepers and jumpsuits are designed for stretch knits only. We suggest fabrics such as flame retardant blanket fleece, sweatshirt fleece, polarfleeceÂ®, double knit, velour and textured knits. The boys' and girls' sleeper and jumpsuit have a zipper front, raglan sleeves and ribbing cuffs. View A has feet with gripper fabric and a ribbing neckband. View B has a hood with elastic and ribbing leg cuffs.
